title: How to add someone as a friend?

replies.body: I'm wondering if there is a command in game or like a way in the forums?
replies.body_tagged: I'm wondering if there is a command in game or like a way in the forums?

replies.body:
Hi, Poker.

You can add friends by going to their profiles at old.avicus.net for some reason the friend button hasnt been put in on the new site


EDIT: I removed the message, Snow. ;)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: oh ok thx. sorry that i made a post that has been made a lot of times.
replies.body_tagged: oh ok thx. sorry that i made a post that has been made a lot of times.

replies.body:
You can do it on the old site, you'll have to ask the person to go to the site to accept it though.

It'll be added next website update:
replies.body_tagged:
You can do it on the old site, you'll have to ask the person to go to the site to accept it though.

It'll be added next website update:

replies.body:
Just keep in mind that you may see many of these threads but other newer people haven't.
If someone asks a question that many people have asked before, they may be new to Avicus.
All you gotta do is answer their question.

replies.body: I get it now, but what's the link to the old website? I've only just signed up on this new one. how do I get to the old Avicus network website?
replies.body_tagged: I get it now, but what's the link to the old website? I've only just signed up on this new one. how do I get to the old Avicus network website?

replies.body: The old website is gone. D:
replies.body_tagged: The old website is gone. D:

reply_to.body: I get it now, but what's the link to the old website? I've only just signed up on this new one. how do I get to the old Avicus network website?
reply_to.body_tagged: I get it now, but what's the link to the old website? I've only just signed up on this new one. how do I get to the old Avicus network website?

replies.body:
As 99250 said, the old website (old.avicus.net) has been taken down.
As a result, you cannot add friends at the moment.

But, I'm pretty sure it's planned to come out in a future update though.
So look out for that!
